targets.expr: sum by (instance,hardware) (ohm_cpu_load_percent{sensor="CPU Total"}) * on(instance) group_left(instance,host_system) up{job="ohmgraphite"}
sum by (instance,hardware) (ohm_gpunvidia_load_percent{sensor="GPU Core"}) * on(instance) group_left(instance,host_system) up{job="ohmgraphite"}
sum by (instance,hardware) (ohm_gpuati_load_percent{sensor="GPU Core"}) * on(instance) group_left(instance,host_system) up{job="ohmgraphite"}

( sum by (host_system) (ohm_ram_bytes{sensor="Memory Used"}) ) / 
( sum by (host_system) (ohm_ram_bytes{sensor="Memory Available"}) + sum by (host_system) (ohm_ram_bytes{sensor="Memory Used"}) )
max by(host_system) (ohm_cpu_watts{sensor=~".*Package"}) + max by(host_system) (ohm_gpuati_watts{sensor=~".*Package"}) + max by(host_system) (ohm_gpunvidia_watts{sensor=~".*Package"})

( sum (ohm_ram_bytes{instance=~"$instance",sensor="Memory Used"}) ) / 
( sum (ohm_ram_bytes{instance=~"$instance",sensor="Memory Available"}) + sum  (ohm_ram_bytes{instance=~"$instance",sensor="Memory Used"}) )
